articles.title: The Process. The Decision. The Big Three. They Changed the N.B.A.

articles.content:
Victor Mather
Senior staff editor and reporter

Many are separated from their families. A directive from the Qapqal government ordered children of working couples to be put in care home villages for the young, boarding schools for older ones so their parents could move for work.

articles.title: Want longer eyelashes? Products are booming, but do they work?
articles.description: Companies large and small are releasing lash-growth serums. But what really works for growing fuller, thicker lashes?
articles.content:

articles.author: Mark Miller
articles.title: The decade in retirement: Wealthy Americans gained a sharp advantage
articles.description: Retirement wealth has accumulated almost exclusively among higher-income households, while middle- and lower-income households have only held steady or lost ground.
articles.content:
Retirement in America has become a tale of two very different realities in the decade now drawing to a close.
